user_request.sanitized: Create a Builder agent who's purpose is to recompile/build projects (towards end of plan) and troubleshoot build issues. Add build scripts storage per workspace/plan with fields: name, description, date, directory, MCP handles. Display scripts in frontend table. Add Goals/Success Criteria tab to plan display.

requirements: 1. Create Builder agent with troubleshooting capabilities for build failures
2. Add build scripts storage in data folder (per workspace and per plan)
3. Scripts schema: name, description, created_at, required_directory, optional MCP handle
4. Display scripts as table in frontend
5. Add Goals and Success Criteria tab to frontend plan display
6. Optional: Expose scripts as custom MCP workspace tools
constraints: Must integrate with existing agent system and workflow
Scripts must be stored per workspace and per plan
Frontend must display scripts in table format
MCP tool exposure should be optional/configurable
Must not break existing agent functionality
examples: Build script example: npm run build in server directory
Script could be exposed as workspace-specific MCP tool
Goals tab similar to existing plan tabs (steps, context, etc.)

additional_notes.sanitized: User wants Builder agent to troubleshoot build issues and ensure successful compilation. Build scripts should be trackable and potentially exposed as MCP workspace tools for automation.
